title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.21 - Public ramp and apron area charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.21 - Public ramp and apron area charges

State Regulations
(a) For an aircraft using the public ramp and
apron area designated by The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey for
loading or unloading passengers, their baggage, or mail, while such aircraft is
actually loading or unloading............ no charge
(b) For an aircraft not actually loading or
unloading passengers, their baggage, or mail, remaining on such area for more
than 10 minutes after the manager of the air terminal has directed that such
aircraft be removed, for each additional 30 minutes or fraction
thereof............ $5.00

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1263.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
